ValidationRule.description: Bid Reg Requests cannot have multiple resellers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: text( Spa_Request_Type__c ) == 'Bid Register Request' && Opportunity.SPA_Resellers__c > 1 && BR_Resellers_OverRide__c == false
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bid Reg Requests cannot have multiple resellers. You may send a resubmission request to remove a reseller and then make a BR. Bid Desk must review first.
